issue.title: [Python][Docs] Add example of specifying type for a column when reading csv file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11373](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11373). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Idea to improve https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/csv.html: add an actual code example of specifying a specific type for a given column (something typical people will want to do I think)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11373?focusedCommentId=17296413) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9386
